opendial.bn.distribs

Interface UtilityFunction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnchoredRule, UtilityTable

    public interface UtilityFunction
    Generic interface for a utility function (also called value function), mapping every assignment X1, ..., Xn to a scalar utility U(X1, ...., Xn).

    Typically, at least one of these X1, ..., Xn variables consist of a decision variable.

    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UtilityFunction copy()
      Creates a copy of the utility distribution
      double getUtil(Assignment input)
      Returns the utility associated with the specific assignment of values for the input nodes.
      void modifyVariableId(java.lang.String oldId, java.lang.String newId)
      Changes the variable label

    • Method Detail

      • getUtil

        double getUtil(Assignment input)
        Returns the utility associated with the specific assignment of values for the input nodes. If none exists, returns 0.0f.
        Parameters:
        input - the value assignment for the input chance nodes
        Returns:
        the associated utility

      • copy

        UtilityFunction copy()
        Creates a copy of the utility distribution
        Returns:
        the copy

      • modifyVariableId

        void modifyVariableId(java.lang.String oldId,
                      java.lang.String newId)
        Changes the variable label
        Parameters:
        oldId - the old variable label
        newId - the new variable label
